name: Cherry Inhere
description: Innovative way to touch devices play the game. The block speeds can be modified. Are you good at this game? Are you good? Try Extreme Difficulty Solver Mode. Circle Pong is a modern twist on a classic game! The rules are simple. Keep the pong bouncing inside the circle. Circle Pong feature: - The circle with the pong inside, thatâ€™s all - A leaderboard to rank player position How to play Circle Pong: Your goal is to keep the pong bouncing inside the circle. You can control only the direction of paddle movement just by tapping the screen.
